name: Outbreak (itch) (Jangosan)
description:
Outbreak is a 2D top-down shooter with story based progression made in Unity as part of my university coursework.

The game is currently still in development, but the first two levels are playable all the way through.

Additional info:

This game also uses a variety of sounds from https://freesound.org/ for a full list of references please look at this document :

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qyuD35yOTYU-DLGH1ZHDWr1apB4c2cxg1YN3Zfme0e0/...
